title: LRD user access the Payroll Report Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD user has navigated to the Major Contracts dashboard on left nav
custom_steps: WHEN they click the Payroll Reports Tab
custom_expected:
THEN the utility will load 
AND by default the utility will only display the Year and Type dropdowns. Both default to blank. 
AND the View button is also visible but is disabled.  
AND Year dropdown has all previous year for which reports have been saved, and the current year and following year.

title: LRD user sees more fields if "New" is selected for Type
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Utility [C181752]
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "New" in the type dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN "As of Date" and "Save As" dropdowns also appear, and are blank by default.
AND * The "View" button will also be replaced by the "Generate" button.  
AND The As Of Date field should only accept a valid date. 
AND The "Save As" field should default to blank, but should have Opening Day, All Star, August 31st, Final as options.

title: View existing Saved Payroll Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a Year and selects anything OTHER than "New"
custom_expected:
THEN the View button becomes active 
AND clicking View will load the saved report

title: Generate a New Payroll Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Utility 
AND has selected a Year and "New" for Type [C182117]
AND has completed the "As of" and "Save As" fields 
AND the Generate Button is now active
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Generate
custom_expected:
THEN  Clicking Generate will generate the CBT Impact Player Details Report, and the LRD Impact Player Details report and display the report in the utility, per the wireframe (styling and other specifics to be handled in follow up stories). 
AND CBT Impact Player Details will be displayed by default. 

AND Wireframe:
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=payroll_report

title: LRD user views a different Org's LRD 40-Man Payroll or CBT Payroll
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Payroll Report (saved or generated)
custom_steps: WHEN the user changes the "Org" dropdown and the "Show" dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the report will update based on the selected dropdowns

title: LRD User Edits Payroll Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Saved or newly generated Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Edit
custom_expected:
THEN the form will load in edit mode 
AND all filters will become disabled 
AND only the totals and any rows associated with players that have been removed will not be editable. All other fields will be editable

title: LRD User Saves changes to a Payroll Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has made edits to a Payroll Report [C182455]
AND is still in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN all entered values will be saved 
AND the form will load in view mode 
AND a successful blue notification will display

title: LRD user views Total LRD 40-Man Impact for each player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is viewing a Payroll Report 
AND LRD is selected for Show dropdown
custom_steps: WHEN LRD is selected for Show dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN an Total LRD Impact column will appear 
AND a value will populate for each player based on the numbers entered in the utility. 
AND column will recalculate on Save if updates are made to the other numbers in the utility

title: LRD user views Total CBT  Impact for each player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN CBT is selected for Show dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN an Total CBT Impact column will appear 
AND a value will populate for each player based on the numbers entered in the utility. 
AND column will recalculate on Save if updates are made to the other numbers in the utility

title: LRD user views LRD 40-Man Payroll Player Details
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user if viewing a Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN LRD is selected for Show dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the screen will refresh and display the LRD values of the report

title: LRD user views CB Tax Payroll Player Details
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user if viewing a Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN CBT is selected for Show dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the screen will refresh and display the CBT values of the report

title: Default Filter to most commonly used
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to advanced search
custom_expected:
IF the user is searching for Minor Contracts, THEN default filter to Signing Date 
IF the user is searching for Professional Player, THEN default filter to Last Name 
IF the user is searching for Domestic Amateur, THEN default filter to Last Name
IF the user is searching for International Amateur, THEN default filter to Last Name 
IF the user is searching for Major Contracts, THEN default filter to Status
IF the user is searching for Transactions, THEN default filter to Type

title: Club user views Deferred Comp Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the club user has logged in 
AND has clicked Major Contracts from the Left nav tab
custom_steps: WHEN they click the Deferred Compensation Tab
custom_expected:
THEN the Club's Deferred Compensation funding utility will load 
AND The Org displayed will be locked to the Club user's Org (cannot view other Orgs). 
AND "Funding As Of" will default to July of the current year through July, and July of the following year through December. (Ex: In August 2016 this will read July 2017) 
AND Discount Rate is defaulted to 5%.

title: View player's details in the Deferred Comp funding screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp funding screen 
AND is viewing an Org's Deferred Comp
custom_steps: WHEN the user expands the row of a specific player
custom_expected: THEN expanding a row will display as many rows as are needed within that expansion to capture the information for the player, including all payment sources relevant to the current values entered into the Deferred Comp Funding screen.

title: As a user I want to view each payment source
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Screen 
AND if viewing a specific's Org's Deferred Comp
custom_steps: WHEN they expand a Player row
custom_expected:
THEN the sources column will change from the number of sources when the row was unexpanded to listening out each payment source. 
AND the number of payment sources should match the number that displayed when the row was unexpanded 
AND Each Payment Source will display the Date, Amount and Present Value of the deferred compensation associated with that payment source. 
AND  Each player will also have a Payment Source labeled "Totals" that will display the total Amount deferred (Amt), the total amount funded as of the entered date (fnd) and the present value of the deferred comp (PV) and the present value of the funded deferred comp (Fnd PV).

title: View Deferred Comp Utility using a different discount rate
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Deferred Comp utility for a specific org
custom_steps:
WHEN the user adjusts the discount rate with a valid entry ( can enter up to 99.999- System will not allow for any other) 
AND clicks View
custom_expected: THEN the page will refresh to reflect the new Discount rate

title: See note at the top of the deferred comp utility reflecting current deadlines
custom_steps: WHEN a user is viewing the Deferred Comp funding utility
custom_expected:
THEN they will see a note at the top of the page 
AND text will read "Funding certifications due to the Commissioner's Office by Date 1 (format ex: July 31, 2016); Date 2; Date 3; and Date 4
AND Date 1 will be replaced  July 31, (year selected in funding as of filter); Date 2 will be replaced by October 31, (year selected in funding as of filter); Date 3 will be replaced by January 31, (year selected in funding as of filter + 1); and Date 4 will be replaced by April 30, (year selected in funding as of filter +1)  

*NOTE - last AC is how it works in ebis1. We have altered this slightly to reorder the dates and only showing dates occurring AFTER the entered as of date. (Ex: if funding as of is set to february 2018 it will read - Funding certifications due to the Commissioner's Office by 4/30/2018; 7/31/2018; 10/31/2018; and 1/31/2019) This is good for now and we will change later if users push back. *

title: Funding As of Date will be dropdowns
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Funding As of Field
custom_expected:
THEN  the "Funding As Of" field on the Deferred Comp utility should actually be composed of 1 dropdown and a year field, not a datepicker.
AND  the first dropdown should contain the available months - January, April, July and October. 
AND The year field should allow the entry of a valid year (must be 4 whole numbers)

title: Add new Authorized Signature from a Major Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is creating a new Major Contract
AND is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the NEW link that appears above the Authorized Signatory field
custom_expected:
THEN a modal will launch that allows the user to enter a new Authorized Signatory 
AND the MJ UPC will be checked

title: Save New Authorized Signature
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed [C181753]
custom_steps:
WHEN the user fills out the required fields on the modal 
AND clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN a new Authorized Signatory will be created 
AND appears in the dropdown

IF the user clicks Cancel
THEN no Authorized Signatory will be created and the user is returned to the form

title: View added Authorized Signature in widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has created a new authorized Signature [C181754]
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the Authorized Signatory Widget 
AND searches for their created authorized Signatory
custom_expected: THEN the Authorized Signatory should appear in the widget with MJ UPC checked

title: Run Makeable Bonus Batch
custom_preconds:
Nothing for QA to Verify  - just make sure it runs 

GIVEN the user has navigated to Makeable Bonus Batch Screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user Runs the batch in all Modes
custom_expected: THEN the batch will run successful and Results and Batch History Widget will update
